name: Arthur Hayes Warns Bitcoin Could Drop to $80K With Liquidity Weakness and Market Stress
description: The biometric augur kneels, charting the painful descent. As the volumetric river of pure computation drains away, corrupted static noise consumes the landscape, signaling the critical systemic weakness of the retreating flow.
